StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetAdjustedBusinessPercentage]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Organiza.onID int, @FiscalYear int, @Month int AS
SELECT ISNULL (ABP.TC_PERCENT, 0) AS TC_PERCENT, ISNULL (ABP.OT_PERCENT, 0) AS OT_PERCENT, ISNULL (ABP.AC_PERCENT, 0) AS AC_PERCENT, ISNULL (ABP.HV_PERCENT, 0) AS HV_PERCENT FROM ADJUSTED_BUSINESS_PERCENTAGE ABP WHERE ABP.ORGANIZATION_ID = @Organiza.onID AND ABP.FISCAL_YEAR = @FiscalYear AND ABP.MONTH_CODE = @Month
